actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to increase payments under the medicare program to Puerto Rico hospitals.
short_title: Medicare Puerto Rico Hospital Payment Parity Act of 2000

summary.text: Medicare Puerto Rico Hospital Payment Parity Act of 2000 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to increase base payment amounts to Puerto Rico hospitals and to revise the calculation of Medicare disproportionate share payments for prospective payment system hospitals in Puerto Rico.

titles.title: Medicare Puerto Rico Hospital Payment Parity Act of 2000
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to increase payments under the medicare program to Puerto Rico hospitals.
